dealItems.name: Ceramic Tea Pot
dealItems.description: This fine ceramic teapot is suitable for everyday household use. It has a 32 ounce capacity. Dishwasher and microwave safe.

dealItems.name: Metal Tea Infuser
dealItems.description: A great gift for tea lovers! Steeps perfect cups of loose-leaf tea and features a press handle for easy cleanup.

dealItems.name: Hand Coffee Grinder
dealItems.description: A modern, sleek look with a glass container.

dealItems.name: 200 Count #4 Coffee Filters
dealItems.description: Microfine perforations allow the full coffee flavor to filter through for a rich, flavorful cup of coffee.

dealItems.name: Stoneware Sugar Bowl and Creamer Set
dealItems.description: Microwave and dishwasher safe. Creamer holds 12 ounces; sugar bowl with lid holds 1 cup.

dealItems.name: Semi Automatic Espresso Machine
dealItems.description: This Espresso Machine brings the coffeehouse to your home. So simple to use!
